I also notice in the FAQ at the homepage of Heritrix, the answer for 
the common problem 5, "..., or, if you want to instead look at 
document mimetypes, you can Add a ContentTypeRegExpFilter filter as 
a midfetch filter to the http fetcher. This filter will be checked 
after the response headers have been downloaded but before the 
response content is fetched. ..."

I wonder how to do this.
use a HEAD request before the GET, or get the content-type and match 
with the filter after this.http.excuteMethod(method) and before 
rec.getRecordedInput().readFullyOrUtil(..);
